item.title: TodX : The Todo Manager
item.description: So, I have been working this past few weeks on a todo application using commandline interface in Python. You can skip the boring backstory and jump right into installation if you want to. The project’s source code is available at GitHub Backstory I recently switched to i3 windows manager just to try it out. And I loved it. I have now become used to living in the terminal.
